auth.quotes: Those people who develop the ability to continuously acquire new and better forms of knowledge that they can apply to their work and to their lives will be the movers and shakers in our society for the indefinite future

category.title: Select Category
category.subtitle: Explore a variety of topics and test your knowledge
category.notFoundSub: The category you are looking for does not exist or is not yet available.

quizDetail.title: Quiz
quizDetail.subtitle: Read the following instructions
quizDetail.instruction1: Welcome to the Quiz! This quiz contains multiple-choice questions. Familiarity with the topics is key to enjoying the quiz. Keep the following in mind:
quizDetail.instructionTime2: - Each question has a time limit of
quizDetail.instructionTime3: seconds. You must complete the question within this timeframe.
quizDetail.instructionAnswer2: - You need to answer the current question to move on to the next one.
quizDetail.instruction2: To start the quiz, click the 'Start' button. When you have finished all the questions, click the 'Submit' button to complete the quiz.
quizDetail.notFoundSub: The quiz you are looking for does not exist or is not yet available.
